entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test ItUsesArtifactsOutputPathForPublish intermittently hangs in CI #45057

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45060
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Disable test ItUsesArtifactsOutputPathForPublish #45058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Split GivenThatWeWantToRunILLink test class into multiple so Helix can run them separately #45056
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Use WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities project property #45055
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Use temp directory as TestExecutionDirectory in RunTestsOnHelix.sh #45022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
